GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange, Active Sync)
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Battery, Charger, USB Cable, Handset, Headset, Start-up Guide

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports MIDI, eAAC+, MP3, WAV
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports MPEG4, H.264, H.263, 3GPP, AVI, XviD, MKV, HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: Face and Smile Detection, Auto Focus, Geo-tagging, HDR for Picture and Movie, Image Stabilizer, Self-timer, Image Sensor, Red-eye Reduction, Sweep Panorama, Touch Focus, Smile Shutter, White Balance, Metering, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (GAP, HSP 1.2, HIDP 1.0, A2DP 1.2, FTP 1.2, HFP 1.6, DUN 1.1, AVRCP 1.3, OPP 1.2, PANP 1.0)

Other Features.Important Apps: YouTube, Twitter, Google Talk, Facebook, Gmail, Google Play, Google Voice Search, Widgets, PlayNow, Multiple Instant Messaging
Other Features.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Magnetometer, eCompass

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Scratch Resistant, Pinch-to-Zoom, Multi-touch (Upto 4 Fingers Supported)

Platform.OS: Android v4.1 (Jelly Bean), Upgradable to v4.2 (Jelly Bean)
